typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ss_sold_time_sk as integer,
		ss_item_sk as integer,
		ss_customer_sk as integer,
		ss_cdemo_sk as integer,
		ss_hdemo_sk as integer,
		ss_addr_sk as integer,
		ss_store_sk as integer,
		ss_promo_sk as integer,
		ss_ticket_number as long,
		ss_quantity as integer,
		ss_wholesale_cost as decimal(7,2),
		ss_list_price as decimal(7,2),
		ss_sales_price as decimal(7,2),
		ss_ext_discount_amt as decimal(7,2),
		ss_ext_sales_price as decimal(7,2),
		ss_ext_wholesale_cost as decimal(7,2),
		ss_ext_list_price as decimal(7,2),
		ss_ext_tax as decimal(7,2),
		ss_coupon_amt as decimal(7,2),
		ss_net_paid as decimal(7,2),
		ss_net_paid_inc_tax as decimal(7,2),
		ss_net_profit as decimal(7,2),
		ss_sold_date_sk as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionRootPath: 'store_sales',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['tpcds100/store_sales/**/*.parquet']) ~> source1
source(output(
		d_date_sk as integer,
		d_date_id as string,
		d_date as date,
		d_month_seq as integer,
		d_week_seq as integer,
		d_quarter_seq as integer,
		d_year as integer,
		d_dow as integer,
		d_moy as integer,
		d_dom as integer,
		d_qoy as integer,
		d_fy_year as integer,
		d_fy_quarter_seq as integer,
		d_fy_week_seq as integer,
		d_day_name as string,
		d_quarter_name as string,
		d_holiday as string,
		d_weekend as string,
		d_following_holiday as string,
		d_first_dom as integer,
		d_last_dom as integer,
		d_same_day_ly as integer,
		d_same_day_lq as integer,
		d_current_day as string,
		d_current_week as string,
		d_current_month as string,
		d_current_quarter as string,
		d_current_year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(ss_sold_time_sk == d_date_sk,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(d_year == 2002) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		SSDate = ss_sold_time_sk,
		DDate = d_date_sk,
		{DYear } = d_year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
